articles.title: Trump nominee sworn in as U.S. district judge in Michigan
articles.description: DETROIT (AP) — Federal Magistrate Stephanie Dawkins Davis was sworn in as a U.S. district judge for Michigan’s eastern district.
articles.content:
DETROIT (AP) Federal Magistrate Stephanie Dawkins Davis was sworn in as a U.S. district judge for Michigans eastern district.
The ceremony was held Tuesday evening at the federal courthouse in downtown Detroit, court officials said in a release.

articles.title: Advisory group urges better flood protection in Missouri
articles.description: JEFFERSON CITY, Mo. (AP) — Missouri's levees need to be strengthened and repaired, especially in rural areas hit hard by prolonged flooding in 2019, according to an advisory group appointed by Gov. Mike Parson.
articles.content:

articles.title: Mexico City plastic bag ban to take residents back in time
